title: How to Make Tiramisu Coffee

steps.headline: Mix the mascarpone and thickened cream together gently.
Pour 1.5 tablespoons (73.9 ml) of the liqueur into each glass.
Add the hot coffee to each glass.
Spoon the mascarpone and cream mixture into each glass.
steps.description: Don't worry - while some of it will sink a little, it will mostly float at the the top of the coffee.

steps.headline: Sprinkle hot chocolate over the top of the cream mixture.
Serve.
steps.description: To add to the authenticity, serve on a saucer with a sponge finger for dipping on the plate.

text: Mix the mascarpone and thickened cream together gently.  Pour 1.5 tablespoons (73.9 ml) of the liqueur into each glass.  Add the hot coffee to each glass.  Spoon the mascarpone and cream mixture into each glass. Don't worry - while some of it will sink a little, it will mostly float at the the top of the coffee. Sprinkle hot chocolate over the top of the cream mixture.  Serve. To add to the authenticity, serve on a saucer with a sponge finger for dipping on the plate. Finished.
